author: __ruebezahl__
content:
Hello all! I spent some time after devconnect working on setting up EL differential fuzzing for Besu, Netheremind and EVM via state-tests.

Here's a blog about my current approach, which allows for **in-process, coverage guided fuzzing for all three** with each test case taking around 6-10ms on a laptop.
 Servers can go up to 2-3x the speed!


Feedback/thoughts/suggestions welcome!

https://r9295.github.io/posts/differential-fuzzing-accross-languages/
